mapper.select: SELECT * FROM smgBoard ORDER BY boardIdx DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(boardIdx) +1, 1) AS boardIdx, COALESCE(MAX(boardGroup) +1, 0) AS boardGroup FROM smgBoard
INSERT INTO smgBoard (boardIdx, memID, title, content, writer, boardGroup, boardSequence, boardLevel, boardAvailable) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{memID}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{boardGroup}, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE smgBoard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, indate = NOW() WHERE boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
UPDATE smgBoard SET count = count + 1 WHERE boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
